tool_description: Formats picking lists into various output formats suitable for different devices, printer types, and operational workflows.

raw_pick_data.description: Unformatted picking list data to process

output_format.description: Target output format: pdf, html, csv, json, thermal_print

device_target.description: Target device: desktop, tablet, mobile, printer

include_barcodes.description: Include barcode elements in formatted output

sort_order.description: Item sorting: location, priority, sku, quantity

error_messages: Invalid output format: Use one of [pdf, html, csv, json, thermal_print].
Invalid device target: Use one of [desktop, tablet, mobile, printer].
Invalid sort order: Use one of [location, priority, sku, quantity].
Empty pick data: raw_pick_data cannot be empty or null.
Format conversion error: Unable to convert data to requested format.
usage: Provide raw_pick_data and specify output_format for basic formatting. Set device_target, include_barcodes, and sort_order to customize the formatted output for specific use cases.

formatted_content.description: Formatted picking list in requested format

file_size.description: Size of formatted content in bytes

validation_status.description: Whether formatted content passed validation checks
